markdown.content:
I've seen a lot of you making blogs and stuff, and while I like a lot the idea of setting up a rss feed before cohost shut down, I don't want to use a third party service for it.
Don't get me wrong, is awesome seeing all of you quickly finding a new place that is easy and convenient. But I've been wanting to make a website for myself in ages, and this is a great opportunity for me to finally create one.

It ***will*** take some time to finally make the website I've been idealizing of. But while nothing is ready, I invite you to favorite (or save somewhere) my [neocities](https://nekoraita.neocities.org/) and check it in the future :eggbug:
Alternatively, you can follow me on [bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/nekoraita.bsky.social). I have no idea if I'm actually going to post there, but I'll anounce when my website is finally done.
